1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

```
Add the output of `ytcc bug-report` here
```

Enable the debug logging and run buggy command again. Note, that this can print sensitive information!
